summary: This mod adds the Ancient Falmer Crown to Vyrthur\'s inventory. Only works if you have Dawnguard installed.
descriptionHtml:
As of right now, the Ancient Falmer Crown isn\'t anywhere to be found in-game except within the files itself. This mod adds the crown to Arch-Curate Vyrthur\'s inventory and can be acquired after you kill him.

This mod only works if you have Dawnguard installed.

If there are any issues, please let me know.



Credit:
Any credit goes to Bethesda. I merely gave the players a way to obtain it without console codes.
author: GrZDem
